General.Name: Adyton Resources Corporation
General.Description: Adyton Resources Corporation focuses on the development of gold and copper resources in Papua New Guinea. The company's flagship project is the Feni Gold project located in New Ireland. Adyton Resources Corporation is headquartered in Brisbane, Australia.
